typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> oltpsrc
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> olaptgt
oltpsrc derive(DWHash = sha2(256, age+phone)) ~> createHash
createHash, olaptgt exists(createHash@DWHash == olaptgt@DWHash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> existsInOlap
